dict.string: When first enabling the tweak, enter the passcode next time you unlock your device!
Enables or disables all features of this tweak
Saves passcode so that you don't need to enter it once every respring. Your passcode will always be saved encrypted.
Replaces title above passcode view with the last time the device was unlocked
Applies to last time unlocked and magic passcode
Bypasses the passcode lock when the device was unlocked within a certain period
Bypasses the passcode lock within a certain period when connected to specific Wi-Fi networks
Enables auto-unlock even if a WiFi network is joined while the phone is locked. Otherwise, the device has to be unlocked while connected to enable this feature
Bypasses the passcode lock within a certain period when connected to specific Bluetooth devices
Enables auto-unlock even if a Bluetooth device connects while the phone is locked. Otherwise, the device has to be unlocked while connected to enable this feature
Bypasses the passcode lock when headphones are connected (prior to locking)
Bypasses the passcode lock when the paired Apple Watch is nearby. Note: this does not currently check whether the Watch is unlocked.
Skip the lockscreen when auto-unlocking if no notifications are showing
Even when media controls are showing
Skip the lockscreen when auto-unlocking even if the media control are showing
Gives the ability to unlock the device with a secondary passcode. If unlocked with this code, the auto-unlock feature will temporarily be disabled.
Use values from different sources: time, date, battery, timeout, or custom digits
100 - current percentage, (for example, 32 if battery is at 68%)

This will make the device lock again after the time specified by the passcode digits, where the first digit is in minutes and the second one is in tens of seconds (for example 12 will lock the device again after 1 minute and 20 seconds)
NOTE: If multilple digit pairs are chosen as timeout, only the last pair will be considered: if all are selected to be so, the phone will unlock with any code
Invert the order of the digit pair, applies to all digit options

Apply a mathematical operation to the time value used in a digit pair (for example, with time shift +30 minutes, at 9:41, the time after the shift would be 10:11 therefore the corresponding minute pair would be 11, and the hour one would be 10. This also affects date rollover!
Whether to disable auto-unlock and magic passcode when SOS mode is invoked (by pressing 5 times the lock button, which by default also disables Touch ID/Face ID)
An interval of time during which auto-unlock and magic passcode will be disabled
Whether to disable Touch ID/Face ID as well during this time interval
Keep disabled until next real unlock

Keep auto-unlock and magic passcode disabled even after the time interval specified, until the next passcode unlock (or via Touch ID/Face ID, if not disabled). The tweak will then be reenabled only by a login AFTER the time interval
Disable alert after entering passcode for the first time (useful if you're not saving passcode over resprings)
Composes an email to myself if mail app available
